Title: Properties of Signature Change Patterns
Published: Software Maintenance, 2006. ICSM'06. 22nd IEEE International Conference on
Elements_risk_assessment:
the function at transaction n-
1 has one or more problematic lines, which are fixed in transaction n by changing them
Summary:
provide detailed signature change properties by analyzing seven software project histories 
    to reveal multiple properties of signature changes, including their kind, frequency, correlation with 
    other changes, number of parameter changes, and evolution patterns of signature change kinds.
Outcome: They show that signature changes can be used as measurement aid for software evolution analysis
